news template for mambo 4.5.x
design by Zoran Karadža
email zoran.karadza@gmail.com
website www.zkaradza.tk
based on rhuk_planetfall

Top Menu apply module class sufix: -1
Modules user1,user2,user3,user4 apply module class sufix: -top

for modules in middle columne apply module class sufix: -2
for modules in right column apply module class sufix: -1
